title: I've had multiple S or higher games in the past month, and have received no chests. What gives?

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
I'm sitting on 4 keys and Illaoi is giving me a pretty consistent string of S games. Yet my queue of chests is stuck at 4 (filled.) This is a problem, because the reset timer isn't ticking on them. Which means that, once I finally do get a chest, the next one will have to tick a full timer.

Wondering why I'm not getting the drops. Because I think I've rolled 10+ S games since my last chest dropped.

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and found that you already earned a chest for Illaoi towards the end of June.  A chest can only be earned once per champion per season.  A great way to know if you've already earned a chest is by a gold border around the champion section of your profile.  We also have additional requirements that can be found in our[ hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Hopefully that helps clear things up, but let me know!

1. You can only earn one chest per champ, per season.
2. You have to own that champ to receive a chest. 
3. If you were in a premade and one of your premade teammates earned an S, you would receive a chest and the champ you played with that match would not be able to earn anymore chests for the season.

**[Learn to craft. Learn HexTech Crafting!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)**
